Text.Page:
Ah, I don't even know anymore why I even came to Velika. I wonder when that fool Martin will stop being scared and grab a hold of that toad's horn? That toad is under a spell now and can't even a twitch a muscle!!

What? You're going? No, stop! The Mysterium is still investigating that Manor since the ambush by the monsters. That area is currently prohibited because no one knows what can happen in there.
